short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview websites in different screen sizes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See your website in different screen sizes easily using this extension.

This extension will provide a dedicated page once you click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar. See you webpage in different screen sizes across multiple panels.

You have full control over the sizing, which panel to preview and how many panels to display.
